headline: Procter & Gamble (PG) Valuation Debate Heats Up After Strong Earnings and Insider Sales
summary: Procter & Gamble (PG) just posted quarterly earnings that came in above Wall Street expectations, with both revenue and profit moving higher. However, the stock has continued to slide, reflecting unease about cost pressures and recent insider sales. See our latest analysis for Procter & Gamble. Over the past year, Procter & Gamble’s share price has slipped as investors weigh cost headwinds, softer consumer demand, and the impact of recent insider selling, even as the company continues to...
